title: Practice on Rockblog
description: Thought and work on the redrock postgres database

items.title: Migration from oracle to postgres
items.content_html:
The toughest things happened in migration from oracle to postgres:

The famous ERROR: current transaction is aborted, commands ignored until end of transaction block, and some discussion in community’s pgsql-hackers group: Statement-level rollback.

CNBC’s Eugene Kim posted Amazon’s move off Oracle caused Prime Day outage in one of its biggest warehouses, internal report says.

Amazon’s Baji Shaik, Deepak Mahto, and Sudip Acharya posted Convert the NUMBER data type from Oracle to PostgreSQL – Part 1.

Amazon’s Baji Shaik, Deepak Mahto, and Sudip Acharya posted Convert the NUMBER data type from Oracle to PostgreSQL – Part 2.

Some migration experience:

Venkata B Nagothi’s experience on migration: Migrations to PostgreSQL from Oracle.
